# LLMs.txt for Pragvo Advisors

## Website Overview

Pragvo Advisors LLP is a senior-led strategic advisory firm operating at the intersection of capital strategy and human talent.

## Site Structure

- Hero (`/#`): Strategic Capital & HR Advisory value proposition
- Who We Are (`/#`): Senior attention, conflict-free independence
- Services (`/#services`): Investment Banking & HR Advisory domains
- Why Pragvo (`/#`): Key differentiators and execution approach
- Track Record (`/#track-record`): Performance metrics and statistics
- Contact (`/#contact`): Location, contact information, and consultation scheduling

## Core Services

### Investment Banking
- Debt Capital Markets: Bonds, private credit, syndicated loans, liability management
- Equity Capital Markets: IPO advisory, pre-IPO blocks, follow-on offerings
- M&A Advisory: Special situations, cross-border (GCC/APAC), mergers & divestitures

### HR Advisory
- Talent Acquisition: Executive search, specialist hiring, volume recruitment
- Talent Development: Leadership programs, coaching & mentoring, succession planning
- Organization Design: Operating models, role architecture, governance frameworks
- HRIS Implementation: System selection, configuration & migration, deployment & training
- Performance Management: OKR frameworks, feedback systems, calibration processes
- Compensation & Rewards: Benchmarking, incentive design, total rewards

## Track Record

- Aggregate Transaction Value: ₹35,000 Cr+
- Advisory Experience: 85+ Years
- Successful Mandates: 250+
- Indian Markets Covered: 100%

## Tech Stack

- Frontend: React 19.2, TypeScript 5.9, Vite 7.3
- Styling: Tailwind CSS 4.1, Framer Motion 12.29
- Icons: Lucide React
- Typography: Inter font family

## Contact Information

- Phone: +91 93111-42495
- Email: `info@pragvo.in`
- Location: New Delhi, India
- LinkedIn: `https://linkedin.com/company/pragvo-advisors`
- Instagram: `https://instagram.com/pragvo-advisors`

## Key Differentiators

- Senior partner-led mandates (no delegation to junior staff)
- Conflict-free independence
- Cross-border reach with local regulatory expertise
- Rapid execution and transaction velocity
